cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils

Interface AccountManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileAccountManager

    public interface AccountManager
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils/AccountManager.java

    Interface for storing user accounts for different cloud storage services.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAccountSettings(AccountSettings settings)
      Adds the AccountSettings to local store.
      AccountSettings getAccountSettings(java.lang.String accountId)
      Returns the AccountSettings specified by the identifier.
      java.util.Collection<AccountSettings> getAllAccountSettings()
      Returns all the AccountSettings in the store.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getIdentifiers()
      Returns all the identifiers used for the accounts.
      void removeAccountSettings(java.lang.String accountId)
      Removes the specified AccountSettings.
      void saveAccountSettings()
      Saves all the changes in the AccountSettings store.
